About Me.

I am a student at Sheridan College in Software Development and Network Engineering. I recently graduated from the University of Waterloo from a Bachelors of Science. I love taking on challenging projects as I get to learn more about myself and acquire new skills. I constanstly strive to surpass my own expectations and continual improve myself in all aspects.
